amendment.description: Amendments as modified increase funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $10 million and increase funding for the National Endowment for the Humanities by $3.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An en bloc amendment to increase the bill's appropriation for the National Endowment for the Arts by $10 million and increase the appropriation for the National Endowment for the Humanities by $3.5 million. The amendment is expected to offset these increases with cuts in administrative expenses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendments (A001) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 185 (Roll no. 248).

action.text: Slaughter amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Modification corrects the second instruction in the en bloc amendment from Line 24 to Line 14.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments (A001) offered by Ms. Slaughter.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendments (A001) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 185 (Roll no. 248).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
